mapper.sql: select CWID, CWLX, CWBH, CWZT, XQID, SQID, TCCID, TCCMC, CWZL from ZHSQ_CW
mapper.insert:
insert into ZHSQ_CW
CWID, CWLX, CWBH, CWZT, XQID, SQID, TCCID, TCCMC, CWZL,
#{cwid}, #{cwlx}, #{cwbh}, #{cwzt}, #{xqid}, #{sqid}, #{tccid}, #{tccmc}, #{cwzl},
mapper.delete:
delete from ZHSQ_CW where CWID in
#{cwid}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(case when CWZT=1 then 1 else null end) as allKxCount, count(case when CWZT=2 then 1 else null end) as allZyCount , count(case when CWLX=1 and CWZT=1 then 1 else null end) as allDsKxCount, count(case when CWLX=1 and CWZT=2 then 1 else null end) as allDsZyCount, count(case when CWLX=2 and CWZT=1 then 1 else null end) as allDxKxCount, count(case when CWLX=2 and CWZT=2 then 1 else null end) as allDxZyCount FROM ZHSQ_CW
and XQID = #{xqid} and SQID = #{sqid}

SELECT TOP 5 s.kxCwCount,TCCID,TCCMC,CWLX FROM ( SELECT TOP 5 COUNT (*) kxCwCount, TCCID, TCCMC, dd.dict_label AS CWLX FROM ZHSQ_CW LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd ON CWLX = dd.dict_value
and XQID = #{xqid} and SQID = #{sqid} AND CWLX = '1' AND dd.dict_type = 'pg_cw_type'
GROUP BY TCCID, TCCMC, dd.dict_label UNION SELECT TOP 5 COUNT (*) kxCwCount, TCCID, TCCMC, dd.dict_label AS CWLX FROM ZHSQ_CW LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd ON CWLX = dd.dict_value
and XQID = #{xqid} and SQID = #{sqid} AND CWLX = '2' AND dd.dict_type = 'pg_cw_type'
GROUP BY TCCID, TCCMC, dd.dict_label ) s ORDER BY s.kxCwCount DESC, s.TCCID ASC

SELECT CWID, dd.dict_label CWLX, CWBH, dd1.dict_label CWZT, XQID, SQID, TCCID, TCCMC, CWZL FROM ZHSQ_CW cw LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd on cw.CWLX = dd.dict_value LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd1 on cw.CWZT = dd1.dict_value
and cw.XQID = #{xqid} and cw.SQID = #{sqid} and cw.TCCID = #{tccid} and cw.CWLX = #{cwlx} And dd.dict_type = 'pg_cw_type' And dd1.dict_type = 'pg_cw_status'
order by cw.CWID

SELECT CWID, dd.dict_label CWLX, CWBH, dd1.dict_label CWZT, XQID, SQID, TCCID, TCCMC, CWZL FROM ZHSQ_CW cw LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd on cw.CWLX = dd.dict_value LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data dd1 on cw.CWZT = dd1.dict_value
and cw.XQID = #{xqid} and cw.SQID = #{sqid} and cw.TCCID = #{tccid} and cw.TCCMC = #{tccmc} and cw.CWLX = #{cwlx} AND dd.dict_type = 'pg_cw_type' AND dd1.dict_type = 'pg_cw_status'
ORDER BY cw.CWID
